content: the moonlit petals mosaic crochet square is a delicate blend of geometric and floral designs inspired by petals glowing softly in moonlight this subtle pattern is perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your projects whether you re a beginner looking for an accessible entry into the world of mosaic crochet or an experienced crocheter seeking a new addictive project moonlit petals will inspire and challenge your creativity ready to weave some moonlit magic let s get started each square measures 19cm and you ll need 2 shades of superfine/3ply yarn - less than 1 skein of each colour per square if you use a different yarn to make your square you might require different amounts and your completed square may vary in size inside the pattern you will find detailed written instructions written in us terms special stitch explanations and diagrams clear round-by round photos easy to read chart required tools materials needed less than one cake of hobbii universe the colourway seen in the photos is called supercluster and any complementary contrasting colour of the same 3 ply/superfine weight 3mm / d3 hook measuring tape for gauge yarn needle scissors find more squares in this series here https //www ravelry com/designers/crochet-hooks-and-magic this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a neat and beautifully formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly and includes special stitch schematics full written pattern round-by-round photos and chart
